metadata.title: CVE-2020-36558 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition in the Linux kernel before 5.5.7 involving VT_RESIZEXcould lead to a NULL pointer dereference and general protection fault.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
